* Iron Raptor watches as the doors of Prowls quarters open and they walk it, 
following the direction of his pointing finger towards a door in the side of 
the room.
She picked herself up from leaning her weight on him and looked down at the 
mech-fluid which coated her black armor, shaking her head.*

" No thanks, love. I think I can manage..."

* And with that she left Prowls grasp and headed towards the door towards 
the bathroom, slightly looking over the room as she traveled there.
She quickly entered the room and turned on the lights, thinking to herself 
that it was a fairly nice bathroom for a battleship.
Iron Raptor spotted the closed in shower and sighed, trying to remember the 
last time she bothered to do such a thing, coming to the grose conclusion 
that she never had.
She shrugged, there was a first time for everything.
The door to the bathroom closed with a thud behind her, startling her 
slightly and making her snapp her head towards the sound. Making her vision 
blur a bit, clutching the wall to keep her balance.
Iron Raptor slightly staggered towards the shower, finally falling to her 
knees and hanging off the wall.
It was happening again, the pain...
But something else was happening at the same time too, something that she 
didn't remember happening before...but it had.

When she had been at the Alliance base, her rising rage had caused her beast 
modes to merge, and become uncontrolable.
Well, it was happening again.
Only now there was no need for the rage, only one simple fact:

Both beast modes were in battle with each other, each wanting to be the 
dominent of the two.
And at the current moment, the velociraptor was dominent, as it had been for 
a while. When Iron Raptor transfored into her second beast mode, the 
creature was dominent.
Now, now they were fighting. The creature against the raptor, each 
fighting...and that was what had been causing her great pains.
They had been merging, and now they were ready to be released onto the 
world.

Iron Raptor could almost feel it, her armor shifting and her own mech-fluids 
DNA code changing...and it hurt like hell!!!
She suddenly stood with a scream, the pain more then she could ever handle, 
still not knowing what was happening until it was too late!!

With a roar the fembot was transformed, shifting into a mode which held the 
form of the merged beast modes. Except...it was different then before.
Instead of a large raptor, there stood something else, covered in the 
mech-fluid of the fembot it had been just moments before.
It stood on all fours, it's clawed limbs digging into the metal of the 
bathroom floor.
About the side of a large horse, silver stripes covering it's body, a light 
shade of gray covering it's belly, bottom jaw and all the way to the tip of 
it's whiplike tail. The claw of a raptor emerged from the first toe on each 
ot it's hind feet, the head with it's flat skull swining in every direction, 
taking everything in.

Here stood a creature, hald raptor, but more of the second beast mode.

But as it stood there in the flurecent light of Prowls washroom, it turned 
it's head towards the door, letting lose the growl of a hungry nightmare. 
It's systems craving cybertronien flesh.*


( I'm adding a pic of an Alien from the movie series, as well as a VERY 
rough sketch of the posture of IRs third BM.
OK. The colored pic is basically what she is, but she doesn't stand upright 
like that.
It's the sketch which she stands like.
So, just imagin the alien in the colored pic in the posture of the sketch, 
as well as with the details I described in the post...and there you have it. 
IR's third BM.
Thank you for your time.
If the sketch did not come, I am posting it again.)
